nodes.text: Hydrosoy sprays were a type of food served at the Canto Casino Hotel in the city of Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica. In 34 ABY, Kedpin Shoklop, a Wermal salesbeing, noticed hydrosoy sprays among the food offered during midmeal at the Canto Casino Hotel.

Hydrosoy sprays were mentioned in the 2017 short story "Rules of the Game," written by Saladin Ahmed for the novella collection Canto Bight, released as part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi multimedia project.
